# TokenFlight Embed - llms.txt

Compact index for LLM agents and tooling.
Base URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai

For full structured context, use:
- https://embed.tokenflight.ai/llms-full.txt

## Core
- TokenFlight: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/ — Interactive playground for cross-chain token swap Web Components.
- Getting Started: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/getting-started/ — Install the TokenFlight Embed SDK and render your first widget.

## Guides
- Error Handling: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/error-handling/ — Handle errors from TokenFlight widgets using callbacks, error codes, and the TokenFlightError class.
- Internationalization (i18n): https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/i18n/ — Localize TokenFlight widgets with built-in language packs for English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
- llms.txt for AI Tools: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/llms-txt/ — TokenFlight docs publish machine-readable indexes at /llms.txt and /llms-full.txt for AI assistants and retrieval pipelines.
- Theming & Custom Colors: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/theming/ — Customize the look of TokenFlight widgets with built-in themes, auto dark mode, and CSS variable overrides.
- Token Pre-selection: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/token-preselection/ — Pre-fill source and destination tokens using object literals, CAIP-10 strings, or JSON.
- Custom Wallet Adapter: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/wallet-adapter/ — Build your own wallet adapter to connect any wallet provider to TokenFlight widgets.

## Examples
- AppKit: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/appkit/ — Integrate TokenFlight widgets with Reown AppKit (WalletConnect).
- ethers: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/ethers/ — Integrate TokenFlight widgets with ethers and an injected EIP-1193 wallet provider.
- Privy: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/privy/ — Integrate TokenFlight widgets with Privy authentication and embedded wallets.
- Receive Widget: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/receive/ — Configuration options and usage examples for the TokenFlight Receive widget.
- Swap Widget: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/swap/ — Configuration options, callbacks, and usage examples for the TokenFlight Swap widget.
- Thirdweb: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/thirdweb/ — Integrate TokenFlight widgets with thirdweb wallets.
- Vanilla JS Demo: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/vanilla/ — A complete example using TokenFlight widgets with plain HTML and JavaScript.
- wagmi: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/wagmi/ — Integrate TokenFlight widgets with wagmi connectors.
